org.apache.hivemind.impl
Class HivemoduleProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.impl.HivemoduleProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hivemind.impl.RegistryProvider
public class HivemoduleProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hivemind.impl.RegistryProvider

Implementation of RegistryProvider that loads all xml modules defined in META-INF/hivemodule.xml files.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String HIVE_MODULE_XML
          The default path, within a JAR or the classpath, to the XML HiveMind module deployment descriptor: META-INF/hivemodule.xml.

Field Detail

HIVE_MODULE_XML

public static final java.lang.String HIVE_MODULE_XML
The default path, within a JAR or the classpath, to the XML HiveMind module deployment descriptor: META-INF/hivemodule.xml. Use this constant with the XmlModuleReader.readClassPathModules(String) constructor.
